attributes.action: encourage social landlords to allow the keeping of chickens in the gardens of rural properties.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Not so long ago, people were encouraged to keep chickens in their backyard. Social landlords vary considerably on their policy for allowing tenants to keep them. I can keep pigeons but not chickens. 
I am asking the govt. to encourage RSL's to allow their rural tenants to keep maximum of 4 chickens (hens not cockerels) for egg production in their own backgardens.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
